instruction: Generate a report summarizing your understanding of a given iPhone.
output: The Apple iPhone XS Max is a flagship device released in late 2018 featuring a 6.5-inch Super Retina OLED display with a resolution of 1242 X 2688 pixels. It is powered by a Hexa-core (2x2.35 GHz Lightning + 4x1.9 GHz Thunder) processor and an Apple A12 Bionic chipset with 4GB of RAM and 64/256/512GB of ROM storage options. It has a 12MP primary camera with dual optical image stabilization and a 7MP secondary camera. It runs on iOS 12 and has a built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery with wireless charging support. It features FaceID facial recognition technology and is web-ready with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities. This version of the iPhone also comes with a dual-SIM card slot, so users can keep two active lines at once.
